original_text: These four small yards were 20 metres long and 15 metres wide. They were all the same size.
korean_text: 뜰의 네 구석 안에는 집이 있으니 길이는 마흔 척이요 너비는 서른 척이라 구석의 네 뜰이 같은 크기며

sentences.original_text: These four small yards were 20 metres long
sentences.korean_translation: 이 네 개의 작은 뜰은 길이가 20미터였고

sentences.original_text: They were all the same size.
